hero.description: I am a Computer Science MSc Student at ELTE.

bio.p1: I'm Farkas Bence, a software engineer and MSc student at Eötvös Loránd University (ELTE). I am passionate about problem-solving and building systems that not only work but are scalable and maintainable.
bio.p2: My goal is to apply the knowledge and experience I have gained through my studies and personal projects effectively in a professional environment. I am particularly interested in web development and software engineering. I am open to learning new technologies and committed to continuous professional growth.

highScool.desc: IT specialization, advanced programming and computer science.

elsWorkoutApp.title: ELS - EatLiftSleep Workout Logger App
elsWorkoutApp.description: ELS (EatLiftSleep) is a full-stack web application designed to track workouts, nutrition, body weight, and sleep in a structured and consistent way, enabling long-term progress monitoring.

salaryCalculator.title: Salary Calculator App
salaryCalculator.description: The goal of the application is to implement a comprehensive salary calculator in a React environment, capable of handling various Hungarian tax benefits and managing the combined income of multiple family members.

potatoMapGame.title: Cartographer - Potato Map
potatoMapGame.description: A browser-based strategy game inspired by the board game Cartographers. The goal is to map out a kingdom by placing terrain shapes while completing changing missions across four seasons.

pokemonCardTrader.title: Pokémon Card Trader App
pokemonCardTrader.description: Users can manage their collections, trade cards, and administrators can manage the global card database.

contact.subTitle: Let's talk tech!
contact.text: I am currently open to new opportunities and projects. If you have an idea or just want to chat on a professional topic, feel free to write!
